room_title: Escape room "The Epicurean" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We did in escape room as a family and had a great time.  Really good fun to take on diffetent roles and work as a team to solve the challenge.  Very much recommend giving it a try!

room_title: Escape room "The Epicurean" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was my second escape room experience, and it was great. William (Will. I. Am.) was an awesome guide, very entertaining.We did The Epicurean, the easiest room. There was a ton to do for our team of eight. It was a very creative room, less of an escape and more a treasure hunt, which is a neat difference.One of the things we love about this type of entertainment is the interactivity. Your group is often paired with people you don't know so you get to meet new people. It makes for a unique experience.

room_title: Escape room "The Epicurean" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: This was a lot of fun. Great attention to detail. We did The Epicurean which was a great beginner room. Can't even imagine what their hardest challenge, The Society, would be like... but will find out soon :-) Definitely doing this again.

room_title: Escape room "The Epicurean" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We did the Epicurean room. It was a lot of fun! You will definitely need at least 7-8 people to complete this room. Highly recommend it!

room_title: Escape room "The Epicurean" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I have been to a couple of escape games and this is BY FAR the best. It's a very nice facility. The employees are very friendly and knowledgeable. They make sure you are set up for success! I did the Epicurean with my husband and brother and sister-in-law. We would have benefited from having another pair or two, but we did just fine by pairing up and tackling the game.

room_title: Escape room "The Epicurean" by Escape This in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: We did the chef themed room and it was really fun. They walk you through the escape room process and it was a great brain teasing process. The management was very professional and knowledgeable. We all had a great time and appreciate the above and beyond service we received.
